sourcesContent:
// ViewIssueModal.js import React from 'react'; import { X } from 'lucide-react'; export default function ViewIssueModal({ issue, onClose }) { if (!issue) return null; const solution = issue.solution || issue.solutions?.[0]; return (

Issue Details

Reported By

NT ID: {issue?.ntId || '-'}

Email: {issue?.email || '-'}

{solution && typeof solution === 'object' && (

Solved By

NT ID: {solution?.ntId || solution?.solvedBy || '-'}

Email: {solution?.email || '-'}

Solution Type: {solution?.category || '-'}

)}

Project Details

Project Name: {issue.projectName}

Customer: {issue.customerName}

Rated Power: {issue.ratedPower} kW

Rated Speed: {issue.ratedSpeed} rpm

Application: {issue.application}

Legislation: {issue.legislation}

FIE System: {issue.fieSystem}

EGT System: {issue.egtSystem}

Fuel Type: {issue.fuelType}

Issue Type: {issue.issueType}

Issue Description

{issue.description}

{issue.files?.length > 0 && (

Attachments

    {issue.files.map((file) => (
  • {file.originalname}
    • ))}
)} {solution && (

Solution

Description: {solution.description}

{solution.files?.length > 0 && (

Solution Attachments

    {solution.files.map((file) => (
  • {file.originalname}
    • ))}
)}
)}
); }
